attributes.action: honour the manchester politician Gias Uddin Choudhury.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This appeal is to honour and recognise the wonderful work done by Mr Gias Uddin Choudhury. He is a polictian in the Greater Manchester area, together with help of some celebrity friends including Arthur Scargill he has found a charity to help young asian children and teenagers to intergrate into the community. The 'Oh Yeah Its Good Dat' foundation has made a positive impact on these young peoples lives. I think a plaque recognizing the good work done by Mr Choudhury would be fitting.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
